text: ennal allahuvilum avanre dutanmarilum visvasiccavararea avar tanneyan tannalute raksitavinkal satyasandhanmarum satyasaksikalum. avarkk avarute pratiphalavum avarute prakasavumuntayirikkum. satyanisedham kaikkeallukayum nam'mute drstantannale nisedhiccu tallukayum ceytavararea avar tanneyan narakakkar
